alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 2:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST/445 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR DEADMAN WASH IN WUPATKI NM... * WHAT...Flooding continues due to additional rainfall. Showers and thunderstorms look to be moving out of the area soon. * WHERE...A portion of north central Arizona, including Deadman Wash in Wupatki NM. * WHEN...Until 345 PM MST /445 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 216 PM MST /316 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Deadman Wash, Kanaa Wash, and Doney Mountain Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wupatki National Monument, and Wupatki Visitors Center. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
